channel.title: admin on Mijian Xu
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Mijian Xu

item.description: I’m a PhD student at Nanjing University, School of Earth Sciences and Engineering My research interests include crustal and upper-mantle structures and Artificial Intelligence in the seismology. I have been working in Zhouchuan Huang’s group since 2013, which focus on: Earth structures of east Asia and the Tibet Plateau in Cenozoic P and S wave seismic anisotropy and tomography Subduction zones: structures, geodynamics and seismotectonics. In this group, I contributed to the crustal and mantle transition zone structures in SE Tibet using Receiver Function method.
